PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-04562019-05-09,  ,  ,  ,  CH
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of MARIAN K. BROWN of Vancouver, British Columbia, to be Vice-Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the National Museum of Science and Technology, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective June 30, 2019, in the place of Jim Silye, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
